## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/simplecompiler">SimpleCompiler</a> that owns its <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a>.

This is convenient for clients who don&#39;t want to own their TargetMachines, e.g. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/lljit">LLJIT</a>.

Definition at line 66 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/compileutils-h">CompileUtils.h</a>.
